title: Quail's eggs with asparagus and Parmesan shavings
ingredients: ["125 g (4½ oz) lamb's lettuce", '2 heads chicory, about 170 g (6 oz) in total', '15 g (½ oz) fresh chives, snipped', '750 g (1 lb 10 oz) asparagus', '1 tsp vinegar', "12 quail's eggs", '50 g (1¾ oz) Parmesan cheese, cut into fine shavings', 'Mustard vinaigrette', '2 tbsp extra virgin olive oil', '2 tsp red wine vinegar', '1 garlic clove, crushed', '½ tsp wholegrain mustard', 'salt and pepper']
